Name: Verify Successful Checkout Process for Multiple Items
Description: Navigate to the home page and login to access the inventory. Add multiple items to the cart and proceed to checkout. Verify the checkout process at the first step.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
step 2: Click on div 'login credentials'
step 3: Login -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
step 4: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack'
step 5: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light'
step 6: Click on link '2' -> Navigate to page 'cart.html'
step 7: Click on button 'checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
